Software Developer | Canada (remote) | Computer vision, 3D graphics, Games, Hardware integration

I'm a software developer with 20 years of experience. In the past years I've worked a lot on Computer Vision applications, robotics, 3D/2D graphics using OpenGL and DirectX, mobile, games and database system.

I have a lot of experience with hardware integration, working with sensors, quadcopters, 3D printers, etc. I'm a maker at heart and active in the hackerspace community.

I own and run http://ookpiklabs.com, we do technology based workshops for all ages.

Looking for a freelance part-time or full-time contract work. I'm based in Canada and can work remotely.

Check out my CV and portfolio at http://ShacharWeis.com
